official_title: A bill to remove the designation of the third Monday in February as a legal public holiday.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to remove the designation of the third Monday in February as a legal public holiday relating to Washington's Birthday. Makes conforming changes regarding contested elections, rules of any Federal agency, and rules of certain Federal courts.

titles.title: A bill to remove the designation of the third Monday in February as a legal public holiday.
